name: Seven Samurai RL (7SRL) (7DRL)
description:
Seven samurai must defend a village of nervous farmers from a gang of bandits!  Submission for 7DRL 2020.

If you're having issues with the spacebar causing scrolling, please use this version:

http://benhem.com/games/7srl/

(It contains several minor edits to the official 7DRL version.  These are listed.)
